address: 4001 Palm Blvd, Isle of Palms, SC 29451, USA

nearbyCategories.description: Enjoy fresh seafood and stunning views at nearby restaurants. Many options within a 5-10 minute drive, such as 'Poe's Tavern' and 'The Boathouse at Breach Inlet'.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a sunset view over Breach Inlet, with outdoor seating at 'The Boathouse' visible, showcasing fresh seafood dishes on the table. Focus on warm lighting and inviting atmosphere.

nearbyCategories.category: Local Coffee Shops and Breakfast Spots
nearbyCategories.description: Start your day with coffee and pastries at local cafes. Within a short drive you can find places like 'Island Joe's Coffee' for a quick bite.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the interior of 'Island Joe's Coffee', focusing on the barista making a latte and showcasing the cozy atmosphere with customers enjoying coffee and pastries.

nearbyCategories.category: Popular Isle of Palms Tourist Attractions
nearbyCategories.description: Explore Isle of Palms' beautiful beaches and historic sites. The beach is easily accessible, and 'Fort Sumter' is a short drive away.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a sunny day on Isle of Palms beach, with families enjoying the sand and surf. Include the iconic Isle of Palms fishing pier in the background.

nearbyCategories.description: Enjoy outdoor activities like swimming, surfing, and biking. 'Isle of Palms County Park' offers various recreational facilities and is nearby.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of people playing volleyball at Isle of Palms County Park. Focus on the active lifestyle and beautiful scenery with palm trees and blue skies.

nearbyCategories.description: Easily stock up on groceries and essentials at nearby stores. 'Harris Teeter' is a short drive away for all your needs.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the fresh produce section in 'Harris Teeter' on Isle of Palms, showcasing the variety of fruits and vegetables available.

nearbyCategories.category: Golf Courses and Country Clubs for Golfers
nearbyCategories.description: Tee off at world-class golf courses in the area. 'Wild Dunes Resort' offers stunning courses with ocean views, just a short drive.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a golfer teeing off on the 'Links Course at Wild Dunes', with the ocean and palm trees in the background. Focus on the beautiful landscape and sunny weather.

nearbyCategories.description: Access convenient healthcare services and pharmacies. 'Walgreens' provides essential medications and healthcare products within a reasonable drive.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the exterior of 'Walgreens' in Isle of Palms, showcasing the pharmacy and its convenient location for vacationers needing healthcare products.

nearbyCategories.category: Unique Local Shopping Boutiques and Stores
nearbyCategories.description: Find souvenirs and unique items at local boutiques. Explore shops on 'Front Beach' for beachwear and gifts within walking distance.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the storefront of 'Salty Goat Mercantile' in Isle of Palms, displaying beach-themed souvenirs and clothing. Focus on the colorful and inviting atmosphere.

nearbyCategories.description: Access transportation options including car rentals and the airport. 'Charleston International Airport (CHS)' is a short drive away. Car rental companies are available nearby.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the exterior of 'Charleston International Airport (CHS)' during a sunny day. Include cars arriving and departing, emphasizing ease of access for travelers.
